xxl.core.math.queries

Class QueryFeedbackSelectivityEstimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.math.queries.QueryFeedbackSelectivityEstimator

  • public abstract class QueryFeedbackSelectivityEstimator
extends Object
    This class provides a skeleton implementation for selectivity estimators using query feedback as an improvement. The general idea relies on [CR93]: Chen, Roussopolous, Adaptive Selectivity Estimation using Query Feedback, 1993.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected List<Object[]> alreadyProcessedQueries
      Stores the already processed queries with the corresponding true selectivity.
      protected int numberOfEstimates
      Stores the number of estimates already done.

      Constructor and Description
      QueryFeedbackSelectivityEstimator()
      Constructs a new Object of this type.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void addQuery(Object query, double sel)
      Stores an already processed query and its true selectivity to do an adjustment in order to improve following estimations.
      double estimate(Object query, double trueSelectivity)
      Returns an estimation of the selectivity of a given query.
      protected abstract double getSelectivity(Object query)
      Computes an estimation of the selectivity of the given query.

    • Field Detail

      • numberOfEstimates

        protected int numberOfEstimates
        Stores the number of estimates already done.

      • alreadyProcessedQueries

        protected List<Object[]> alreadyProcessedQueries
        Stores the already processed queries with the corresponding true selectivity. The information about these queries is necessary to do a proper adjustment of the estimator.

    • Constructor Detail

      • QueryFeedbackSelectivityEstimator

        public QueryFeedbackSelectivityEstimator()
        Constructs a new Object of this type.

    • Method Detail

      • estimate

        public double estimate(Object query,
                       double trueSelectivity)
        Returns an estimation of the selectivity of a given query. Before the estimation is returned, the query and the true selectivity are stored in the list of already processed queries.
        Parameters:
        query - query to estimate
        trueSelectivity - true selectivity of the given query
        Returns:
        an estimation of the selectivity of the given query

      • addQuery

        protected void addQuery(Object query,
                        double sel)
        Stores an already processed query and its true selectivity to do an adjustment in order to improve following estimations.
        Parameters:
        query - query to store
        sel - true selectivity to store

      • getSelectivity

        protected abstract double getSelectivity(Object query)
        Computes an estimation of the selectivity of the given query. This method must be implemented by classes inherited from this class.
        Parameters:
        query - query to process
        Returns:
        an estimation of the selectivity of the given query
